channel.title: 667 - Need an banning and unbanning system that sends to file
channel.description: Hi! I need someone to help me make a banning system that sends the character name to a file. I need this because someone hacked into my account and banned all my players. I have learned from that and now I need a proper banning system. Can someone help? I am willing to pay if someone does it for me.
